name: World Cup Mayhem
description: With the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia starting June 14, this is the perfect, fun, quick game to play in between half-time's and matches to keep you in the World Cup spirit! All the countries in this years competition are featured in World Cup Mayhem as playable soccer balls! Also featured are this years, and the previous World Cup Official Songs! Download and enjoy the game, and watching this years World Cup!
